results.title: FleshPool
results.creator_credit: SBS Independent, ACMI and Julie Rrap
results.brief_description: Julie Rrap’s unconventional nude study uses digital imaging to stunning effect, creating a fleshy mutant form as a woman slides into her own reflection.
results.description: Julie Rrap’s unconventional nude study uses digital imaging to stunning effect, creating a fleshy mutant form as a woman slides into her own reflection.
description_for_label: Julie Rrap’s unconventional nude study uses digital imaging to stunning effect, creating a fleshy mutant form as a woman slides into her own reflection.

results.title: Knit-face
results.creator_credit: SBS Independent, ACMI and Janet Merewether
results.brief_description: Janet Merewether’s comic portrait series of knitted dolls illuminates the unpredictable, shabby beauty of found objects and gleefully appreciates the individual, creative application of this traditional craft form.
results.description: Janet Merewether’s comic portrait series of knitted dolls illuminates the unpredictable, shabby beauty of found objects and gleefully appreciates the individual, creative application of this traditional craft form.

results.title: The Day Before I Went Away
results.creator_credit: SBS Independent, ACMI and Guo Jian
results.brief_description: Guo Jian’s saucy and sinister reappropriation of Chinese propaganda painting techniques is heightened by this animation of his allegorical work ‘The Day Before I Went Away’.
results.description: Guo Jian’s saucy and sinister reappropriation of Chinese propaganda painting techniques is heightened by this animation of his allegorical work ‘The Day Before I Went Away’.

results.title: Ost offic
results.creator_credit: SBS Independent, ACMI and Helen Grace
results.brief_description: Helen Grace reworks images of a disused rural post office and repurposes found footage in this poetic meditation on the fragility of civic space.
results.description: Helen Grace reworks images of a disused rural post office and repurposes found footage in this poetic meditation on the fragility of civic space.
description_for_label: Helen Grace reworks images of a disused rural post office and repurposes found footage in this poetic meditation on the fragility of civic space.

results.title: Fountain
results.creator_credit: SBS Independent, ACMI and Shaun Gladwell
results.brief_description: Featuring renowned breakdancer Morganics pulling his moves in a water fountain, Shaun Gladwell’s street-wise video ‘painting’ plays with performance, gravity and time to unsettle expectations of urban space.
results.description: Featuring renowned breakdancer Morganics pulling his moves in a water fountain, Shaun Gladwell’s street-wise video ‘painting’ plays with performance, gravity and time to unsettle expectations of urban space.
description_for_label: Featuring renowned breakdancer Morganics pulling his moves in a water fountain, Shaun Gladwell’s street-wise video ‘painting’ plays with performance, gravity and time to unsettle expectations of urban space.

results.title: Vessel
results.creator_credit: SBS Independent, ACMI and Simryn Gill
results.brief_description: Simryn Gill’s languid mini-series stills the television screen, her camera framing a simple fishing boat and its passage, in real time, across the horizon.
results.description: Simryn Gill’s languid mini-series stills the television screen, her camera framing a simple fishing boat and its passage, in real time, across the horizon.

results.title: A 30 second portrait, starring Phil Lombardo
results.creator_credit: SBS Independent, ACMI and Cherine Fahd
results.material_description: Single channel moving image, colour and audio
results.brief_description: Cherine Fahd’s loving and gently funny video portrait of Phil Lombardo, a young man obsessed with Michael Jackson, continues her visual investigation into the politics of personal identity.
results.description: Cherine Fahd’s loving and gently funny video portrait of Phil Lombardo, a young man obsessed with Michael Jackson, continues her visual investigation into the politics of personal identity.
description_for_label: Cherine Fahd’s loving and gently funny video portrait of Phil Lombardo, a young man obsessed with Michael Jackson, continues her visual investigation into the politics of personal identity.

results.title: Train No. 6
results.creator_credit: ACMI, SBS Independent and Daniel Crooks
results.brief_description: Using Melbourne’s urban landscape, ‘Train No.6’ extends Crooks’ exploration of his ‘TimeSlice’ technique. A simple train is reconfigured across time to form mesmerising polyocular images.
results.description: Using Melbourne’s urban landscape, ‘Train No.6’ extends Crooks’ exploration of his ‘TimeSlice’ technique. A simple train is reconfigured across time to form mesmerising polyocular images.

results.title: Whitefellanormal
results.creator_credit: SBS Independent, ACMI and Vernon Ah Kee
results.brief_description: Vernon Ah Kee’s seething representation of contemporary Australian black/white politics playfully uses language, moving text and self-portraiture to deadly serious effect.
results.creator_credit_for_label: SBS Independent, ACMI and Vernon Ah Kee
results.description: Vernon Ah Kee’s seething representation of contemporary Australian black/white politics playfully uses language, moving text and self-portraiture to deadly serious effect.
description_for_label: Vernon Ah Kee’s seething representation of contemporary Australian black/white politics playfully uses language, moving text and self-portraiture to deadly serious effect.
